aka: No Shadows - A Day on the Equator

cast.name: 阿兰·霍夫曼尼斯 Alan Hofmanis

writer.name: 凯文·麦克马洪 Kevin McMahon

director.name: 凯文·麦克马洪 Kevin McMahon

this_title: Equator: A New World View Season 1
trans_title: No Shadows - A Day on the Equator
introduction: The Equator wraps Earth in a 40,000 kilometre ribbon of sunlight, abundance and astonishing nature. It is known in science as the "cradle of nature" – because all species first arose here – and as the "museum of life" because rarely do creatures here go extinct. Now, as our warmest region gets hotter, the Equatorial paradise is changing. Equator – A new world view is a fascinating series that explores that change while reveling in the beauty of this extraordinary place.Including 12 episodes…Equinox (Episode 1)Diversity (Episode 2)Transformations (Episode 3)…
chinese_title: Equator: A New World View Season 1
